original_title: А кто не любит Генделя, тот получит пенделя
overview: The story of an expat musician that sounds like a bad dream. The film was shot in Hollywood in January 2018. The author of the idea of the film and the lead actor is cellist Evgeny Tonkha, composer Anna Drubich.
title: А кто не любит Генделя, тот получит пенделя
